Isha Tejan-Cole Johansen (amụrụ 25 Disemba 1965  ) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Sierra Leone na onye bụbu onye isi oche otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Sierra Leone

Johansen bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole n'ụwa nke chịburu otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba,  ya na Lydia Nsekera, onye bụbu onye isi oche otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Burundi, Izetta Sombo Wesley, onye bụbu onye isi otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Liberia na Sonia
Bien-Aime nke ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Turks na Caicos Islands
Isha Johansen bụ onye nwe na CEO nke Sierra Leone National Premier League club FC Johansen
A mụrụ Isha Johansen dị ka Isha Tejan-Cole na Freetown, Sierra Leone, n'ime ezinụlọ Tejan-Cole, ndị sitere na Aku Mohammedan
A mikpuru ya na bọọlụ site na mmalite, dịka nna ya hibere East End Lions FC na Freetown
Nna ya kpọọrọ ya gaa hụ egwuregwu bọọlụ, ya na ụmụnne ya na ndị enyi ya na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe obibi ndị nọn na Freeport na ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Yeovil, England
Isha Johansen tọrọ ntọala bọọlụ nke ya, FC Johansen, na 2004
A malitere klọb ahụ na ebumnobi nke inye nduzi na ohere nye ụmụaka ndị agha obodo Sierra Leone mebiri ndụ ha na nso nso a (1991–2002)
Ọ malitere igwu egwu na Nkeji Mbụ na 2011 wee bulite ya na Premier League n'afọ sochirinụ.

A họpụtara Johansen ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Sierra Leone (SLFA) na-enweghị mmegide na 3 August 2013,  mgbe onye kacha na mmegide ya, onye bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Sierra Leone Mohamed Kallon kwụsịrị site na kọmitii Executiv egwuregwu boolu nke Sierra Leone n'ihi na ọ gaghị emezu ihe achọrọ obibi SLFA
Kallon rịọrọ mgbaghara ya, mana ndị nnọchi anya FIFA na Freetown kwadoro nkwenye nke Kallon na ndị ọzọ na-aga ime abụọ (maka njikọ ịgba chaa chaa),  ya mere Johansen enweghị mmegide
Mgbe a manyere Sepp Blatter ka ọ rituo dị ka onye isi FIFA, Johansen chere na ọ ga-anọchi anya ndị nta akụkọ
